eu.opends.trigger

Class ManipulateObjectTriggerAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.opends.trigger.TriggerAction
      • eu.opends.trigger.ManipulateObjectTriggerAction

  • public class ManipulateObjectTriggerAction
extends TriggerAction
    This class represents a ManipulateObject trigger action. Whenever a collision with a related trigger was detected, the given object will be manipulated in the specified way.
    Author:
    Rafael Math

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ManipulateObjectTriggerAction(SimulationBasics sim, float delay, int maxRepeat, java.lang.String objectID)
      Creates a new ManipulateObject trigger action instance, providing maximum number of repetitions and the object to manipulate.

        public ManipulateObjectTriggerAction(SimulationBasics sim,

                             java.lang.String objectID)
        Creates a new ManipulateObject trigger action instance, providing maximum number of repetitions and the object to manipulate.
        Parameters:
        maxRepeat - Maximum number how often the trigger can be hit.
        objectID - ID of the object to manipulate.
